com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine

Class SpenControlStroke

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine.SpenControlBase
        • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine.SpenControlStroke
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable.Callback, AccessibilityEventSource, KeyEvent.Callback

    public class SpenControlStroke
extends SpenControlBase
    control class that manages stroke object.
    ControlStroke is sub class of ControlBase. It is a control class for the stroke object which is been selected.

    Since:
    3.0.0
